doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Zarrio by Eduardo García

main.div:
Skip to content
Issue 160 – January 2020
Cover Art
Zarrio
Eduardo García is a Spanish designer/illustrator who works primarily in the videogame industry. He has also illustrated various board games and provided concept art for some small computer indie games. He is currently working on "The Settlers" for Blue Byte.

div.p: ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
